1.0.0.en: Updated to SDK 3. Added Insights support. Device tile dims when connection is not available.

1.0.2.en: Changing the port number no longer requires a restart of the app to take effect. The online and offline flow cards where reversed for the TCP device.

2.0.0.en: Changed the App ID so it can be published in the Athom store. Changed the capability to an alarm to conform with guidelines

2.0.2.en: Reorganised old code to reduce memory usage

2.0.3.en: Added Log viewer to Configure App page

2.0.4.en: Fix Send Log feature. Fixed issue where polling could stop on a successful connection.
